Help Text: This e-commerce flag is marked by the https://app.clay.com/workspaces/239721/ clay table.

This is the legacy "is ecommerce" field. It is calculated based off of "has_shopping_cart_c" = 1 OR financial_product_type_c = 'ecommerce' OR luz_revenue_c > 0. If any of these are true, is ecommerce = yes.

Data Type: Formula - output should be a TRUE/FALSE Checkbox
Help Text: SoT for "PE Backing". This field determines whether a company is currently or has previously been invested in by a Private Equity firm.
Location of Field:
Please create a new section under Koala on the Sales tab called "Private Equity" https://monosnap.com/file/2z2xOPrhKPMDVahw0XtdyabYTXp3nm

This should be on any startups and GTM layouts as well as System Admin

Field Editability: **New override field - unlike the others above, this should be editable by all
Help Text: If you think a company is mis-marked as PE-backed when it shouldn't be or should be marked as PE-backed and is not currently, please update this field
Custom Logic:
To create a condition that if they override = TRUE, there must be a value in SFDC_Override_PE_Investors__c. Let's trigger a box to insert data into that field here.

If they override to FALSE, we want to update the Brex Private Equity Investors field so that it is NULL.

Help Text: This field is cacluated in a Snowflake table and compares top private equity firms vs. Harmonic, Crunchbase and ZoomInfo investor data to determine if this company is PE-backed or not

Data Type: Formula - output should be a TRUE/FALSE Checkbox
Help Text: This field is calculated from the Harmonic Last Funding Type field. If Harmonic last funding type = Private_Equity or LBO_Buyout, this field = TRUE.
Custom Logic:
This should be a formula field based on the Harmonic_Last_Funding_Type__c field. If this field CONTAINS "Private_Equity" OR "        
BUYOUT_LBO", then mark "TRUE". I want this to only be a one time update so the first time, Harmonic_Last_Funding_Type contains "Private Equity" or "BUYOUT_LBO", this should get flipped to "TRUE" - if it gets updated again for the same record and no longer contains one of those, I want it to remain TRUE. Is that possible?

Help Text: SoT for PE Investors. Lists all PE firms associated with this company.
Custom Logic: Can we build out logic for this field so that instead of only showing the SFDC_Override_PE_Investors__c value if it's not NULL, concatenate the values of SFDC_Override_PE_Investors__c;Snowflake_PE_Investors

Field Editability: **New override field - unlike the others above, this should be editable by all
Help Text: If you think a PE firm that's listed in Brex Private Equity Investors should be removed or added, use this field to edit.
Calculated field in Snowflake pulling investor information from Crunchbase, ZoomInfo and Harmonic in order to list out all private equity firms associated with this account.
